channel.title: Mynlp文档首页 on Mynlp文档
channel.description: Recent content in Mynlp文档首页 on Mynlp文档

item.title: 基本用法
item.description: mynlp多个功能被划分在不同的模块中，下面演示分词模块： GRADLE compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-segment:3.0.1' 或者MAVEN <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-segment</artifactId> <version>3.0.1</version> </dependency> 模块（artifactId） 功能 mynlp-core 基础功能 Guice

item.title: 安装
item.description: mynlp多个功能被划分在不同的模块中，下面演示分词模块： GRADLE compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-segment:3.0.1' 或者MAVEN <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-segment</artifactId> <version>3.0.1</version> </dependency> 模块（artifactId） 功能 mynlp-core 基础功能 Guice

item.title: 感知机应用示例-拼音流切分
Build-in Shortcodes
item.description: See https://gohugo.io/content-management/shortcodes/#use-hugos-built-in-shortcodes figure 2 People Sitting With View of Yellow Flowers during Daytime gist highlight <section id="main"> <div> <h1 id="title">{{ .Title }}</h1> {{ range .Data.Pages }} {{ .Render "summary"}} {{ end }} </div> </section> instagram View this post on Instagram #Talitha #Getty #yacht in #fjærland #fjærlandsfjorden #sognefjorden #mundal #norway #landscape #panorama #travel #instagoodmyphoto #justgoshoot #peoplescreatives #visualsoflife #photography #photoshoot #photodaily #photogram #instagood #picoftheday #fjærland #photooftheday #pentax #nrksf #sognavis

item.title: Table of Contents
item.description: The TableOfContents field set to true in your content’s front matter will render a table of contents. TableOfContents: true Setting the built-in .TableOfContents variables can configure what heading levels you want to include in TOC. See the built-in .TableOfContents variables settings Section 1 Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. item.title: 拼音转换
item.description: 安装 Maven: <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-pinyin</artifactId> <version>3.x</version> </dependency> Gradle: compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-pinyin:3.x' 文字转拼音本质上是根据词典进行转换的，底层采用AhoCorasickDoubleArrayTrie进行高性能识别和转换

item.title: 文本摘要
item.description: 安装 Maven: <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-summary</artifactId> <version>3.x</version> </dependency> Gradle: compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-summary:3.x' API 文本摘要包含了两个简单TextRank的实现。 关键字摘要 KeywordSummary keywordSummary = new KeywordSummary(); keywordSummary.keyword("text",10); 句子摘要 SentenceSummary sentenceSummary = new SentenceSummary(); List<String> result = sentenceSummary.summarySentences(document, 10); KeywordSum

item.title: 繁简体转换
item.description: 安装 Maven: <dependency> <groupId>com.mayabot.mynlp</groupId> <artifactId>mynlp-transform</artifactId> <version>3.x</version> </dependency> Gradle: compile 'com.mayabot.mynlp:mynlp-transform:3.x' API Simplified2Traditional s2t = TransformService.simplified2Traditional(); s2t.transform("软件和体育的艺术"); 繁体转简体 Traditional2Simplified t2s = TransformService.traditional2Simplified(); t2s.transfo

item.title: 日志服务
item.description: Mynlp中日志输出，不是简单打印到控制台，或者指定使用某个日志系统。 我们借鉴了Elasticsearch中适配各个日志组件的方法，这样设计

item.title: 资源加载器
item.description: MynlpEnv对象负责从系统中加载文件资源，包含三个默认加载器： File JARFile classpath 当你通过maven依赖导入资源文件jar后，classpath加载器

item.title: 酒店评论分类示例
item.description: 从网上找了一份酒店评论正负面的语料库来测试，演示和验证fasttext文本分类。 代码如下: import com.google.common.base.Charsets; import com.google.common.io.Files; import com.mayabot.mynlp.fasttext.FastText; import com.mayabot.nlp.classification.FasttextClassification; import com.mayabot.nlp.utils.DownloadUtils; import java.io.File; import java.util.List; /** * 酒店评论的分类测试
